description: Tags a resource (either an entity or change set).

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Required. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the resource you want to tag.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Required. A list of objects specifying each key name and value. Number of objects allowed: 1-50. (dict) --- A list of objects specifying each key name and value. The key associated with the tag. The value associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value associated with the tag.
